oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Peace Demands Grow"

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Labor History, War
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Panel: President Lyndon B. Johnson standing in front of a map of Asia. Second Panel: Troops approaching protesters. Third Panel: American troops in Vietnam.
